text.tspan: Hi - I am reaching out from the Adobe extensibility team. I’d love to
connect and chat about Adobe Express. I saw you created the
Pointillism plugin and wanted to get your thoughts on bringing it to
Would you be available to connect this week or next? I’ve also added
my Calendly here if you prefer to select a time directly.
Here is a quick summary about Adobe Express and I'll be able to
provide more details and walk through a demo, as needed. It allows
users to make standout content quickly and easily by giving them
access to thousands of templates, fonts, stock images and assets. It
includes generative technology features through Adobe Firefly which
allows for live design generation across images, videos, and fonts.
